title: Dinner Tonight: String Beans with Arugula
summary: Dinner Tonight: String Beans with Arugulan is a gluten free and vegan recipe with 6 servings. One serving contains 193 calories, 10g of protein, and 5g of fat. For 62 cents per serving, this recipe covers 13% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. Head to the store and pick up olive oil, pepper, beans, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 83%. This score is excellent. Similar recipes include Dinner Tonight: String Beans with Tomato, Olive, and Garlic, Dinner Tonight: Shrimp and Grits with Arugula, and Dinner Tonight: Pasta With Arugulan And Tomatoes.
instructions: Procedures                                                                              1                                                                            Bring a large pot of salty water to boil and cook beans, uncovered, until tender. Drain in a colander.

steps.step: Bring a large pot of salty water to boil and cook beans, uncovered, until tender.
